info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:39PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact remote portions of the Mescalero Nations, in north central Otero County through 330 PM MDT... At 238 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Elk Silver, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail are likely with this storm. In addition, heavy rainfall and possible flooding of arroyos and streams. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elk Silver and Sixteen Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
